description: This file defines and initializes Docker management tools and a Docker agent, demonstrating various Docker operations such as listing containers, images, volumes, creating networks, and managing containers through a scripted agent interface.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that can perform tasks using specified tools.

classes.name: DockerTools
classes.description: A class encapsulating Docker management functionalities.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class to output responses based on Docker commands.
